intro: This level introduces HTML forms and different input controls.
points: Create a form using the <form> element.
Use <input> types like text, password, email, number, checkbox, radio.
Use <label> for better accessibility and clickable inputs.
Use <select>, <option> for dropdowns and <textarea> for multi-line input.
Understand basic form attributes: action, method (GET/POST concept only).
